name: pathfinder
description: AI-powered social impact platform for homeless and housing-insecure individuals

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:mobile && npm run build:web && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:mobile && npm run test:web && npm run test:backend

author: Social Impact Team
